reviewText: My running, walking and weightlifting is made tremendously easy by doing this routine 1-2 times per week. Also I have had no lower back pain or injuries since doing it which was a big step up for me!

All you need is a floor and towel. Everything can be easily modified for people with injuries and the stretch is real, despite the odd name. The cover looks low-budget, but the video is better than that. More importantly, the content is worth it.

This dvd has good information for the novice as well as the seasoned practitioner. Kay starts by explaining the rationale of her system and then goes on to explain the poses as they are being demonstrated. What I really appreciate is NO MUSIC in the background.
